message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to you, I propose a starting price of $1,300,000. This is a special opportunity tailored for you, taking into account the significant impact this product can have on your operations.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,300,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your offer. To continue our discussion, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,250,000 for the product. This amount reflects the value it holds for both of us and aims to be a mutually beneficial solution. I look forward to your consideration.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,250,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,150,000 for the product. This is a fair offer that allows both of us to make a profit. Let's meet in the middle and finalize this deal.

I appreciate your offer, Bob. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000 for the product. This aligns closely with your latest proposal while ensuring a reasonable profit margin for us. I hope this will help us reach an agreement.
